help.title: Help Menu
help.text: Click the title of the course to return to the beginning of the course.
This is the navigation, and your main means of getting around the course. The main categories are at the top, and the sub-categories listed below. Each section gets checked off as you visit it.
This is the progress bar. It gradually increases as you go through the course, helping you to keep track of your overall progress.

assessment.title: Assessment
assessment.text:
Are you sure you want to exit this learning module?

We encourage you to explore this module thoroughly, revisiting those areas that may require a deeper understanding for you. The more you know, the more results you'll see on the sales floor! You can choose to exit to the assessment at any time.

page.title: Qualcomm Snapdragon Processors
page.name: s1p1
page.laserbeam: Qualcomm® Snapdragon Processors
page.sublaser: Qualcomm Snapdragon processors give your mobile devices breathtaking speed, jaw-dropping graphics and longer battery life so you can do more of the things you love.
page.body: "If you've got any smartphone chances are pretty good that it's powered by one of Qualcomm's Snapdragon chipsets." <cite>— TechCrunch</cite>

page.title: Snapdragon in the Marketplace
page.name: s1p2
page.laserbeam: There are over 1000 Snapdragon devices announced/commercially available including more than 40 tablets. In addition to enabling a large number of Android-powered smartphones, Qualcomm powers all Windows Phones available today. Cumulatively, over 11 billion chips have been shipped to date.

page.title: About Qualcomm
page.name: s1p3
page.laserbeam: Qualcomm is the world leader in mobile technologies.
page.body: Qualcomm innovates and manufactures breakthrough mobile chipsets enabling partners around the world to create next-gen mobile devices, services, and experiences. Qualcomm is making wireless more personal, affordable, and accessible to people everywhere.
page.text: "Qualcomm's reach is global and unsurpassed. They are designed into everywhere that matters." <cite>— Businessweek</cite>

page.title: Technology Splash
page.name: s2p1
page.laserbeam: The part to look for is the part you can’t see.

page.title: Bouquet
page.name: s2p2
page.laserbeam: Roll over each icon to learn more
page.text: Multimedia: Whether you want to capture high-quality photos and videos or watch movies in HD, Qualcomm's audio and video technology lets you do more.
Power Management: Snapdragon has best-in-class technologies designed and built to work together so that your devices work more efficiently. Now you can do more, and recharge less.
Radio Frequency (RF): Support for a wide frequency spectrum to ensure that your device is connected no matter where you are.
Location: Snapdragon processors are first to deliver GPS plus GLONASS for more accurate and reliable positioning.
Modem: Snapdragon processors offer a comprehensive cellular multimode modem solution with integrated support for 4G LTE and 3G to provide a consistent, seamless user experience.
Connectivity: Ubiquitous, real-time connectivity including WWAN, Wi-Fi®, and Bluetooth® technology.
Memory: Memory is essential for all computing needs, from multi-tab web browsing to 3D gaming.
Digital Signal Processor (DSP): Dedicated Sub-processors that help take the load off of the CPU and GPU, freeing up valuable resources and helping preserve battery life.

Central Processing Unit (CPU): The 'brain' of the Snapdragon processor is the Scorpion CPU, which Qualcomm custom designs for mobile. Snapdragon CPU's are performance optimized, allowing fantastic user experiences without draining your battery. Qualcomm's S1 included the first mobile CPU to reach 1GHz speed and the latest S4 leads the pack with the first mobile processor to hit 1.5GHz.

Graphics Processing Unit (GPU): The Snapdragon chipset and its integrated Adreno GPU together enable power-efficient, high-end 3D graphics and console quality gaming across a broad range of mobile devices and on even the largest, highest resolution displays.
Operating System (OS): Our processors support operating systems that run on the majority of mobile devices, including Android and Windows Phone.

page.title: Q10
page.name: s2p3
page.laserbeam: Check out this video to see the “city of interconnectivity” inside Snapdragon enabled devices.

page.title: 200 Processors
page.name: s3p1
page.laserbeam: 200 Processors
page.sublaser: The optimal balance of mobility and low power
page.body:
• Entry level smart-phones and tablets
  • Auto Volume Mode: With the Snapdragon 200 processor, when ambient noise increases the phone speaker volume automatically increases to compensate.
  • Streamlined app discovery: On many Snapdragon 200 devices, apps for video conferencing and GPS are pre-installed.
  • Great graphics performance: The Adreno 302 GPU on the Snapdragon 200 gives great graphics performance for social media and web browsing.

row.td: Up to Quad ARM Cortex A7 CPU at up to 1.4GHz per core
Up to 8 MP camera 720p HD Video (30/15 fps)

page.title: 400 Processors
page.name: s3p2
page.laserbeam: 400 Processors
page.body:
• High volume smart-phones and tablets
  • Faster browsing and downloading: Snapdragon 400 has battery optimized 3G and 4G LTE connectivity for doing more online for longer periods of time.
  • Always connected: the integrated Snapdragon 400 processor provides great voice and data connectivity.
  • Battery life: There it is again - like all Snapdragon processors, Snapdragon 400 is designed to let you stay online longer and recharge less.

row.td: Up to 1.7 GHz Dual Krait 300 CPU
Up to 13.5MP camera, Stereoscopic 3D on select processors 1080p HD video

page.title: 600 Processors
page.name: s3p3
page.laserbeam: 600 Processors
page.sublaser: High Performance for the ultimate recreation
page.body:
• Mid-high tier smart-phones and tablets
  • Battery life: watch more, browser more, and share more while recharging less.
  • Responsive experience: The Snapdragon 600 integrates a graphics processor that's designed for smooth scrolling and zooming - performance you demand for web browsing.
  • Social engagement: With the Snapdragon 600, you can record, upload, and playback more social content.

row.td: Up to 1.9 GHz Quad Krait 300 CPU
Up to 21MP camera, Stereoscopic 3D 1080p HD video

page.title: 600 Processors
page.name: s3p4
page.laserbeam: 800 Processors
page.sublaser: Beyond Mobile. And Beyond all Expectations.
page.body:
• Premium mobile computing devices including: tablets, smartphones, and Smart TVs
  • Battery life: Integrated Snapdragon 800 processors are more efficient, so you can do more and recharge less
  • Entertainment: Ultra HD (4k) video playback and Dolby 7.1 surround bring the home theater experience to wherever you go. And of course, it's battery optimized for more entertainment, longer.
  • Connectivity - An integrated modem with features like 4G LTE, WiFi 802.11ac, and Bluetooth 4.0 makes it easy.

row.td: Up to 2.3 GHz Quad Krait 400 CPU
Up to 21MP camera, Stereoscopic 3D, Dual ISP 4k x 2k UHD video capture/playback

page.title: Experience Splash
page.name: s4p1
page.laserbeam: Experience the difference with Snapdragon by Qualcomm.

page.title: Connectivity
page.name: s4p2
page.laserbeam: Maximizes 3G and 4G LTE wireless networks to deliver the best the web can offer.
page.body: With built-in 3G, 4G LTE, Wi-Fi®, Bluetooth®, GPS, and GLONASS, Snapdragon’s reliable connection and blazing fast speeds are exactly what you need to instantly locate your position or surf the internet.

page.title: Web
page.name: s4p3
page.laserbeam: Lightning fast downloads, immediate responsiveness, enhanced capabilities, and seamless video streaming.
page.body: The wait is over. Snapdragon Processors don’t just give you enhanced speed when you are browsing the web, they also enhance the way you can view it. Snapdragon Processors have built-in hardware that enhances the way you browse the web. From streaming high-definition YouTube videos, to the latest, most cutting-edge online games, your Snapdragon enabled device is designed to tackle anything in the web browser.
page.text: Nearly three times the web-browsing speed*
*Endgadget – Review of the LG Optimus G (Vellamo and GL BenchMark 2.5 Egypt HD)

page.title: Pictures and Video
page.name: s4p4
page.laserbeam: Beyond Mobile. And Beyond all Expectations
page.body:
• Playing ultra HD video
  • Capture video up to 4k x 2k
  • Take photos up to 21 Megapixel
  • Connection to surround-sound HDTVs for theatre-like experiences.

page.title: Gaming
page.name: s4p5
page.laserbeam: Snapdragon's high-performance integrated Adreno GPU breathes fire into mobile 3D games.
page.body: The device user interface and mobile 3D games look ultra realistic, run lightning fast, and virtually sip power. The power efficient design enables high-end, console like gaming experiences on a broad range of mobile devices and on even the largest high-resolution displays.
page.text: Runs your favorite games up to 40% faster.*
*Endgadget – Review of the LG Optimus G (Vellamo and GL BenchMark 2.5 Egypt HD)

page.title: Battery
page.name: s4p6
page.laserbeam: Snapdragon's high-performance integrated Adreno GPU breathes fire into mobile 3D games.
page.body: The device user interface and mobile 3D games look ultra realistic, run lightning fast, and virtually sip power. The power efficient design enables high-end, console like gaming experiences on a broad range of mobile devices and on even the largest high-resolution displays.
page.text: Runs your favorite games up to 40% faster.*
*Endgadget – Review of the LG Optimus G (Vellamo and GL BenchMark 2.5 Egypt HD)

page.title: Practice Splash
page.name: s5p1
page.laserbeam: Let's practice.
page.body: Identify the Snapdragon features that will make the most impact in selling to each customer.

page.title: Customer 1
page.name: s5p2
page.laserbeam: Daniel
page.body: Meet Daniel… He does his homework on purchases and always gets the latest and greatest technology. He spends a lot of time online surfing the Web, playing video games with friends and downloading movies. He often gets frustrated because the quality on his phone just doesn’t compare to his home PC. He wants his mobile experience to offer the same quality with no compromise, wherever he goes.
page.text: Keeping in Touch (Phone Calls, Text, and Video Conferencing)
Entertainment (Music, Gaming, Pictures and Videos)
GPS and Location Based Services
Social Networking
On-The-Go Interactive (Supports Wi-Fi® and Bluetooth®)
Drag features from here...
...over to here
That's correct.

Daniel is looking for a device supporting entertainment that's available wherever he goes. Talk to Daniel more abou the specific features that enhance his experience with entertainment and connectivity such as peer-to-peer enabled gaming
Entertainment (Music, Gaming, Pictures and Videos)
Snapdragon's Adreno GPUs enable high-end 3D graphics, console quality games, and accelerated mobile Web content.
On-The-Go Interactive (Supports Wi-Fi® and Bluetooth®
Connectivity flexibility integrating popular wireless technologies such as Bluetooth®, and Wi-Fi® immediate response.

page.title: Customer 2
page.name: s5p3
page.laserbeam: Olivia
page.body: Olivia is a college student enrolled in business and NEEDS to be connected. She’s got a lot of friends and communicates constantly through text, chat, and voice. She also has a lot of online projects for school. She needs something that’s fast and will always keep her connected—and has the battery life to support it
page.text: Keeping in Touch (Phone Calls, Text, and Video Conferencing)
Entertainment (Music, Gaming, Pictures and Videos)

page.title: Customer 3
page.name: s5p4
page.laserbeam: William
page.body: William works 10 hour days and is on call the rest of the time. His work is fast paced and he has to respond to demanding clients whenever they need him. He travels a lot and depends on his phone’s GPS. His family is also important, so his mobile device needs to support the demands at home as well as work. He needs something that’s responsive and comes with all the latest technologies.
page.text: Keeping in Touch (Phone Calls, Text, and Video Conferencing)
